TopicTitle: Scenario Asteroid Redirect Part 2 Where to maneuver?

Articles.Content:
I always run out of fuel. Sigh.

After attaching to the asteroid and setting Kerbin as target, I do a burn of about 90 s to get in a good plane and into Kerbin's sphere of influence, but when I get there about 9 months later I don't have enough fuel to slow to orbit.

Where should I maneuver?
Try bringing more fuel?  Asteroids are heavy, and require a lot of energy to push around.

Is it this bug (quoted from Flying Rock Challenge):

Quote

As of 21st March 2020: In version 1.9.x there is a bug that affects the mass of small asteroids: #24855 on the bugtracker. Affected asteroids get a mass of 150 t assigned to them instead of the correct value. In the bug report on the bugtracker there is an explanation of a patch that fixes this issue.

Wait, you said "Scenario"? ... *click* *click* *boost* *curse* *click* *clack* *boost* *grab* ... Yupp! It is that problem! You are trying to drag along an asteroid that masses 150 t instead of the 30 t that it is supposed to have.
You can help yourself by aerobraking the roid, for one thing.
